speedyseq 0.5.3.9012

Coerce phyloseq objects to tibbles (tbl_df objects)

Source: R/ps_tibble.R
ps_tibble.Rd

An S4 generic function that serves the role of tibble::as_tibble() on phyloseq and phyloseq-component objects.

ps_tibble(x, ...)

# S4 method for otu_table
ps_tibble(x, pivot = TRUE, .name_repair = base::make.unique)

# S4 method for sample_data
ps_tibble(x, .name_repair = base::make.unique)

# S4 method for taxonomyTable
ps_tibble(x, .name_repair = base::make.unique)

# S4 method for XStringSet
ps_tibble(x)

# S4 method for phyloseq
ps_tibble(x, tax = TRUE, ref = FALSE, .name_repair = base::make.unique)

Arguments

x

A phyloseq object or component.
...

Unused; for methods.
pivot

Whether to pivot the data frame to long format.
.name_repair

Function to repair names in the case of conflicts.
tax

Whether to include taxonomy data.
ref

Whether to include reference sequences.
